title: "INSTANT FEEDBACK REPORT"
body:
Hi everybody,

  Just got a good surprise as I logged in this afternoon: Apparently, a player that I reported had a penalty issued (see screenshot). 
I think the one I reported recently really needed that :P. 

So, many thanks for that.

replies.body: I have reported about ten pieces of shit over a year and none got through. Thx riot ðŸ˜˜

You don't always get the notification. Only the very last person to report before the punishment is triggered receives a notification, so just because you didn't get one, doesn't mean they didn't get punished.

Big deal 

perma ban? no problem!

takes 10 sec to create a new account and troll/feed/verbal abuse more
Well I think perma ban still bother the guy because he has to level to 30.

> You don't always get the notification. Only the very last person to report before the punishment is triggered receives a notification, so just because you didn't get one, doesn't mean they didn't get punished.

Why does it work that way?

Your guess is as good as mine on that one. It's a leftover from the old systems and is being worked on, but I gather it wasn't a super high priority thing (which I would disagree with) until they got their other behaviour stuff up and running so it got pushed to the backburner.
